EEE'17 is part of the 3rd World Congress on Electrical Engineering and Computer Systems and Science (EECSS'17). For more information about the congress, please visit the website here: www.2017.eecss.org.

3rd International Conference on Electrical
Engineering and Electronics (EEE'17)

June 4 - 6, 2017 | Rome, Italy

Paper Submission

·

Important Dates

·

Registration

Search:


EEE'17 is part of the 3rd World Congress on Electrical Engineering and Computer Systems and Science (EECSS'17).
For more information about the congress, please visit the website here: www.2017.eecss.org.

Announcements

1

EEE 2017:

EEE 2017 will be held in Rome, Italy on June 4 - 6, 2017.

EECSS'17 Workshop

As per popular request, the organizing committee has decided to extend the EECSS'17 congress to three days (now June 4 - 6, 2017). The new high-level schedule is as follows:

  • Day 1: Workshop(s) and Registration
  • Day 2: Main Track Conference Sessions
  • Day 2: Main Track Conference Sessions and Gala dinner or Cruise tour

Registration for the workshop will be 121 EURs (VAT included) and separate from the main conferences. Workshop attendees will receive a certificate of participation. For registration, please visit: here.

More information to follow; we greatly appreciate your patience!

2

Best Paper Award:

Two best paper awards will be conferred to author(s) of the papers that receive the highest rank during the peer-review and by the respected session chairs. Please visit Paper Submission for more information.

3

Propose Exhibits, Workshops & More

EEE attracts a wide range of researchers in the field of electrical engineering and electronics. As a prominent company in the field of electrical engineering and electronics, we would like to offer you an exhibit at EEE. Please visit Events for more information.

If you are using this method of payment, you should note that all charges for transferring the money must be paid by the registrants or your registration will be withdrawn.


*Please make sure that you are sending the payment to International ASET Inc. Any other name will result in the rejection of your payment. We will not be responsible for payments rejected because of this reason.
